title: First-Ever Banana Ball Player Draft Results: Every Pick and Round
tags: Savannah Bananas Launch Verified Secondary Market to Block Ticket Scalping and FraudThe Savannah Bananas are launching a verified secondary ticket market in February to eliminate resales above face value and combat fraud.The Prospect TimesThe Prospect Times;Add Now;Banana Ball Adds Two New Teams, Expands 2026 Tour including return to Riders FieldBanana Ball is growing, adding the Loco Beach Coconuts and Indianapolis Clowns.
